product_name: New Balance Minimus 20v3 Cross-Training Shoes - Men's
long_description: If your workouts require versatility, the New Balance Minimus 20v3 Cross-Training Shoes are for you. They provide a stable platform for weightlifting, resistance training and medium-distance running. Synthetic mesh uppers breathe well and resist odors. EVA midsoles effectively cushion your feet when you're running. 4mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. New Balance Minimus 20v3 Cross-Training Shoes can be worn with or without socks. Minimal Vibram(R) rubber outsoles provide excellent, versatile traction.
short_description: If your workouts require versatility, the New Balance Minimus 20v3 Cross-Training Shoes are for you. They provide a stable platform for weightlifting, resistance training and medium-distance running.
